name: Awakened Shrub Totem Elemental
languages: one language known by its creator

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the shrub totem remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub totem.

actions.name: Rake
entries: Melee atk +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1 damage) slashing damage.
